suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Los Cestos - Belén - Las Eras, Ciempozuelos', 'title': 'House in Avenida de Belén, 38'}
description: CENTURY21 Now in Getafe exclusively presents the sale of a children's education center with multiple possibilities of use. From its beginnings to the present, it has developed the activity of daycare, currently a nursery school.It was designed for this purpose and has not ceased its activity, being a reference in the municipality.Designed in detail by early childhood education professionals, but above all with a lot of love to be able to practice in the best conditions.The cycles end and the time for change arrives, so not only a building, but everything it contains is put up for sale.For entrepreneurs in the sector who want to maintain the business, it is ideal, since with a slight facelift it would be possible to continue the activity without affecting school periods. For investors or professionals who have other activities in mind, they will have many conversion options as it is easily adaptable due to the amount of space available.Academies or student residences could be your new life.Universities will soon be installed both in Ciempozuelos, to join the existing ones, and in Valdemoro. The ground floor, hall and entrance hall, has several classrooms with patios and other rooms with different purposes. On the first floor we have another 6 large classrooms with access to common patios for recreation and outdoor activities, several management offices, bathrooms adapted for minors and adults distributed throughout the complex, in the basement is located the industrial kitchen with cold rooms, a large dining room, a staff room, installation rooms, a music room and a splendid theater with a tremendous stage.The elevator connects all floors. In summary, a building with 930m2 built in 2002, plus all the very usable terraces/patios. I could go on in an endless description of every corner of the building, but the best thing is to come see it, because no one can imagine what is inside by seeing it only from the outside or from our magnificent photos and videos. Contact us to clarify your doubts, request plans if necessary and schedule a visit (since there are minors, we cannot coincide with their classes). Ciempozuelos is a Spanish municipality in the south of the Community of Madrid.It is located 35 kilometers away from the capital.According to the 2017 INE municipal registry, the municipality has 23,737 inhabitants. Connections: The most important road is the A4 highway (Madrid-Cádiz) just a couple of kilometers away; the M-404 towards Chinchón and the M-307 towards San Martín de la Vega Transport: The municipality has a railway station, currently Cercanías Madrid, on line C-3 (Aranjuez - Madrid - El Escorial). It has a circular urban line that runs through the municipality, as well as several interurban lines: LineTravel 410Aranjuez - Ciempozuelos – San Martín de la Vega 415Madrid (Villaverde Bajo-Cruce) - Villaconejos 416Valdemoro (Hospital) - San Martín de la Vega - Titulcia - Colmenar de Oreja 425Valdemoro (Hospital) – Ciempozuelos 426Madrid (Legazpi) – Ciempozuelos N402Madrid (Atocha) – Ciempozuelos – Aranjuez.

description: OPPORTUNITY IN CIEMPOZUELOS. EXTERIOR APARTMENT WITH LARGE TERRACE AND WITH BRAND NEW REFORM. BE REAL offers for sale this magnificent renovated apartment for sale on Calle Violeta, in Ciempozuelos, a municipality located in the Community of Madrid. The area offers an excellent quality of life and a strategic location for those looking for a quiet environment but close to the bustling capital. Surrounded by beautiful natural landscapes, this quaint town combines the serenity of a rural setting with the convenience of modern conveniences. Ciempozuelos' location also makes it an attractive place for those looking for an easy connection to the city of Madrid. Thanks to its proximity to the capital, residents can enjoy the tranquility of living in a rural environment while benefiting from the accessibility and opportunities offered by a big city. The property is located in a building built in 2008 and has an elevator for greater comfort. The apartment is located on the first floor and is totally exterior, which allows you to enjoy great light and unobstructed views. With a constructed area of 72 m2 of which 56 m2 are useful, the apartment has undergone a recent brand new reform. Upon entering, we find a cozy entrance hall that leads to a spacious living room. From this space there is access to a wonderful 26 m2 terrace, ideal for enjoying moments outdoors with views of the street. The kitchen is independent and is delivered unfurnished or without electrical appliances, which allows it to be customized according to the needs and tastes of each owner. The master bedroom is furnished and has a spacious built-in wardrobe, providing practical storage space. The bathroom, also renovated, has a bathtub. The apartment has electric heating, climalit windows and wooden floors, offering a warm and comfortable atmosphere in all rooms. Thanks to its orientation, the apartment receives a large amount of sunlight throughout the day, which contributes to creating a pleasant and cozy atmosphere. The storage room is a prominent advantage of this property. Located in the same building, it provides comfort and accessibility, since you can easily access it without having to travel long distances. In addition, this additional space will allow you to make the most of the space in your new home, keeping it organized. This property represents an excellent opportunity both as a regular residential home and as an investment. Its location in Ciempozuelos, in the province of Madrid, provides a great quality of life, with all the services and amenities at your fingertips. Do not miss the opportunity to acquire this charming renovated apartment and enjoy all its advantages in a quiet and comfortable environment. Contact us today for more information and to arrange a viewing. Discover all our products by visiting our website BEREAL.ES Each house has an ideal client and both are at Be Real.
